data.name: ZombieMaze
data.detailed_description:
About this game
"Helicopter is on the roof!!!"
You are the brave person who can survive zombie appocalipes.
there are 3 types of the zombie!! run!!

'Zombie maze' is simply hard game with zombie shooting game.
Player have to find the way to go upstair with killing the zombies.
You don't have to kill all the zombies on the floor
but you better kill all the zombies.
Can you make it to the roof?

'Zombie Maze' features 12 floors with zombies.
all different map with tons of zombies.

Disclaimer
JO is not responsible for nightmares or dizziness.

Controls
Move with WASD keys
relaod gun with R key
change weapon with TAB
menu for ESC
and the finally you can kill zombie with MOUSE LEFT click

Requirements
'Zombie Maze' can work on any Windows computer.

data.short_description: 'Zombie Maze' is simple top-down shooter game with maze. You need to find way to escape. Only way to escape is helicopter on the roof!! RUN!!! and kill that ZOMBIES!!!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 100 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 100 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek

content_descriptors.notes: Shooting zombies and killing zombies with knife and gun
